fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional media to display above the question.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Give one point for the whole task
fields.description: Set the maximum score to one point, where the point is awarded depending on the 'Pass percentage'

fields.label: Require answer before the solution can be viewed
Pass percentage
fields.description: This setting often won't have any effect. It is the percentage of the total score required for getting 1 point when 'Give one point for the whole task' is enabled, and for getting 'result.success' in xAPI statements.

fields.label: Label for the group with the uncategorized words
Aria label for the "Move to Category" button
Hover text for the "Move to Category" button
Aria label for the "Collapse Category" button
Aria label for the "Expand Category" button
Hover text for the "Collapse Category" button
Hover text for the "Expand Category" button
Help text for assigning items to category dropdown menu
Help text for moving items to category dropdown menu
Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The correct assignment will be displayed.

fields.label: Aria label for the correct text segments in the check answer/solution view
Aria label for the incorrect text segments in the check answer/solution view
Aria label for the text segments that indicate the correct position of a text item in the solution view
fields.default: This item should have been placed in this category.

fields.label: Text for "Requires answer" message
fields.default: Please answer before viewing the solution

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

fields.label: Your result
fields.description: :num and :total are variables and will be replaced by their respective values.

fields.label: Category
fields.description: Placeholder text for categories without names

fields.label: Body text
fields.default: Are you sure you want to finish?

fields.label: Body text
fields.default: Are you sure you wish to retry?
